course_description: This course examines biblical views on and responses to poverty, including its various causes, dimensions (social, ethical, and theological), forms, and outcomes. Emphasis will be placed on how church leaders can use biblical frameworks not only to diagnose traditional models of benevolence and outreach but also to develop more effective and just poverty solutions.
